Text:
For those people who don't know, there is a software which allows to mount each ISO file (virtual disc) as if it were a normal disc. If you don't want to burn them into several CD's, you need to install this 

http://www.slysoft.com/en/virtual-clonedrive.html

After that, you only need to double click on each disc in order to see them as if they were fisical CD's.

When installing, each disc (ISO file) will be requested, so you just double click on it and thats all.

To crack the application, you just need to replace the .exe file that is inside the crack into the instalation directory:

Normal Windows
C:Programs filesRosetta Stone ...

64 bits Windows
C:Programs files (x86)Rosetta Stone ...

To install the crack, you just need to replace the RosettaStoneVersion3.exe for the file inside the crack.rar

be aware where you install the application in order to locate the RosettaStoneVersion3.exe and replace it
